name: Celerity Partners
overview:
Celerity Partners was founded in 1995 with the objective of building category-dominant companies. Since its inception, Celerity has invested in more than 30 platform companies, including many industry consolidation projects involving over 60 acquisitions. The total transaction value of these investments exceeds $2.5 billion.

The firm manages approximately $200 million in equity capital across four funds from investors that include some of the world’s largest financial institutions, such as GE Capital, AIG, Allianz, Capital Dynamics and Partners Group. Since 1995, Celerity Partners has supplemented this capital with over $2.5 billion in debt and equity financing raised in connection with investments it has sponsored.
